_comment: Example profile for Helpdesk / Admin roles in Melbourne, Australia
_instructions: Copy this file, rename it (e.g. my_profile.json), and fill in YOUR details below
sponsorship_answer_text: No, I do not require visa sponsorship. I have full work rights.
work_auth_answer_text: Yes, I am legally authorized to work with unrestricted work rights.
cover_letter_text: I have 3+ years of experience in IT helpdesk support, service desk operations, and office administration. I am skilled in customer service, troubleshooting, and managing day-to-day office tasks. I do not require sponsorship and am keen to contribute to your team.
default_answer_text: I have 3+ years of experience in helpdesk support, IT service desk, and office administration. I am enthusiastic about this opportunity.
